text: o visvasulara! Maryam kumarudu isa tana sisyulaku (havariyyun laku) upadesincina vidhanga, miru kuda allah ku sahayakuluga undandi. (Ayana varito ila annadu): "Allah marganlo naku todpadevaru evaru?" A sisyulu ila javabiccaru: "Memu allah (marganlo) todpade varamu!" Appudu israyil santati varilo oka vargam varu visvasincaru, maroka vargam varu tiraskarincaru. Taruvata memu visvasincina variki, vari satruvulaku vyatirekanga sahayam cesamu, kavuna varu adhikyatanu pondaru
